text: Anagema higeno'a Anumzamofo Avamu'mo'a ana 30'a veneneramimofo kva ne' Amasainte egeno amanage hu'ne, Devitiga kagri vahe mani'none. Jesi nemofoga, tagra kagri kaziga mani'none. Hagi arimpa fru zamo'ene maka zampima knare'ma hu'zamo'a kagrane nemanesigeno, kazama hanaza vahe'mo'za hara huzmagatenere'za zamagranena knare hu'za manigahaze. Na'ankure Anumzanka'amo'a kaza huno vugahie. Hagi anagema higeno'a, Deviti'a mago rimpa nehuno sondia vahe'mofo kva zamazeri oti'ne.
